_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 16:45:38 using v2.1
title: What proportion of people feel their service makes them feel safe?
analysis_commentary: The Care and Support White Paper states that a high-quality service must be one which keeps people safe from harm and it is important that vulnerable groups feel safety from the services social care provides. Service users were asked if they were helped to feel safe specifically by their care and support services. The proportion in both years is high (over 75%) and has increased by 2.6% to 78.1% in 2012-13.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Adult Social Care Survey
